title: Good Omens - Official Teaser Trailer (2019) | David Tennant, Michael Sheen
author: GameSpot Universe Trailers
comment: he’s finally ginger! 😂 (like if you get the reference)
I am crying. This is exactly what I wanted and hoped for.
David Tennant is so good at playing villains

"I don't even like you"
"You do!"
My favourite line
description:
Based on the best-selling novel by renowned authors Terry Pratchett and Neil Gaiman, Good Omens follows the story of Aziraphale, an angel, and Crowley, a demon, who have formed an unlikely friendship spanning 6,000 years and have grown fond of life on earth. However, the end of time grows near with the approaching Armageddon and they must now join forces to find a way to save the world. 

Coming to Prime Video in 2019.

Subscribe to GameSpot Universe Trailers!
